Uses of Interface
hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh.IndexedTriangleMesh

    • Uses of IndexedTriangleMesh in hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh

      Subinterfaces of IndexedTriangleMesh in hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IndexedTriangleStrip
      A triangle strip mesh where the strips use indices to reference the points.
      Classes in hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh that implement IndexedTriangleMesh 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractIndexedTriangleStrip
      Abstract superclass for IndexedTriangleStrip objects implementing the IndexedTriangleMesh and the PointList aspects.
      class  IndexedTriangleMeshImpl
      An implementation of IndexTriangleMesh which stores the points as a list of Vector3 and the triangles as a list of point index triples.
      class  IndexedTriangleStripImpl
      An implementation of IndexedTriangleStrip which stores the points in a list, and stores the strips as lists of point indices.
      class  TriangleSetImpl
      A triangle mesh which just stores a list of points.
      Methods in hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh that return IndexedTriangleMesh 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IndexedTriangleMesh Meshes.toIndexed(TriangleMesh mesh)
      Returns the specified mesh as an IndexedTriangleMesh.
